title: Lamar Wilson Interview
itunes:title: Lamar Wilson Interview
description:
Today on the show we had the Co-Founder of Black Bitcoin Billionaire, Lamar Wilson stop by who spoke on the basics of Bitcoin, Crypto’s impact on the black community and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a caller during "Get it off Your Chest" because of his comments on giving money to the Ukraine so they don't come to the U.S and rob them. Moreover, Angela helped some listener out during "Ask Yee" with a listener given a ultimatum about when he has to propose to his lady.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had the Co-Founder of Black Bitcoin Billionaire, Lamar Wilson stop by who spoke on the basics of Bitcoin, Crypto’s impact on the black community and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a caller during "Get it off Your Chest" because of his comments on giving money to the Ukraine so they don't come to the U.S and rob them. Moreover, Angela helped some listener out during "Ask Yee" with a listener given a ultimatum about when he has to propose to his lady.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
